title: The Harmonic Guardian: The Tale of David Baker

story.text: David Baker, a well-respected conductor and counselor, starts his week conducting a local community orchestra practice, unaware that his abilities are about to extend beyond musical notes.

While counseling a young musician battling stage fright, David discovers he has the unusual ability to literally tune into peopleâ€™s emotions and adjust them, bringing harmony not only to music but to minds.

David hesitantly experiments with his newfound powers during a therapy session, helping a client overcome a deep-seated phobia. The success leaves him both exhilarated and burdened by the potential implications.
As word of his unique counseling techniques spreads, David receives an overwhelming number of requests for help. He spends the day harmonizing emotions, realizing the physical toll it takes on him.

A local crisis occurs when a discord in a nearby school escalates into a hostile situation. David intervenes, using his powers to calm the agitated crowd, preventing what could have escalated into violence.

Reflecting on the week, David commits himself to mastering this gift, balancing his life between conducting orchestras and counseling, always aiming to bring peace and harmony wherever there is discord.

David spends a quiet day at home, pondering the ethics of his powers, deciding to keep them a closely guarded secret, used only when truly necessary, to maintain the natural balance of human emotions.

ending: Thus, David Baker became a silent guardian of harmony, both in music and in hearts.
moral: Great power comes with the responsibility to use it wisely, enhancing lives while respecting free will.
